entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Monday 02 May 2016
